Welcome to Foundation CSS

A powerful front-end framework for building responsive websites.

Grid Example with Multiple Columns

Column 1

This is a sample column using Foundation's responsive grid system. It's full width on small screens, half width on medium screens, and one-third width on large screens.

Column 2

Another sample column next to it.

Column 3

This column is full width on small and large screens but half width on medium screens.

XY Grid Example

Grid Cell 1

This is an example using Foundation's XY Grid system. It's responsive and supports various column layouts.

Grid Cell 2

Another grid cell next to it.

Grid Cell 3

This grid cell adjusts its width based on screen size.
